about_the_game:
We proudly launch Drum Legend 2.0 !

Drum Legend is a music rhythm game with multiple drumming gameplay options. In the 'Drum Maestro' mode,you can simulate a band drummer ,learn a variety of drumming skills, and play your favorite music In the 'Rhythm Rush' mode, challenge yourself with more difficult tracks, aim for higher scores.
The game now support Custom Songs! Visit our Discord for Import Guide and get the Song Editor.（Please click the Discord link at the bottom）

- Drum Maestro:
Simulate playing the drum kit and get a taste of being in a band!
This mode comes with a certain level of difficulty. If you haven't played the drum kit before, you can start practicing with the 'Practice Album' song pack.
Enjoy a refined drumming experience with professionally designed drum charts, gradually becoming a VR Soulful Drummer.

- Rhythm Rush:
Don't make any miss, smash all notes accurately!
This mode is easy to pick up, but achieving SSS ranks or challenging level 9+ tracks requires continuous practice.
Every season, we release new featured song packs with meticulously designed music and charts for an exhilarating rhythmic experience.

We welcome your feedback to help us improve the product experience.If you encounter any problems while playing, please contact us at：drumlegend2023@gmail.com

Discord：

We proudly launch Drum Legend 2.0 !

Drum Legend is a music rhythm game with multiple drumming gameplay options. In the 'Drum Maestro' mode,you can simulate a band drummer ,learn a variety of drumming skills, and play your favorite music In the 'Rhythm Rush' mode, challenge yourself with more difficult tracks, aim for higher scores.
The game now support Custom Songs! Visit our Discord for Import Guide and get the Song Editor.（Please click the Discord link at the bottom）

- Drum Maestro:
Simulate playing the drum kit and get a taste of being in a band!
This mode comes with a certain level of difficulty. If you haven't played the drum kit before, you can start practicing with the 'Practice Album' song pack.
Enjoy a refined drumming experience with professionally designed drum charts, gradually becoming a VR Soulful Drummer.

- Rhythm Rush:
Don't make any miss, smash all notes accurately!
This mode is easy to pick up, but achieving SSS ranks or challenging level 9+ tracks requires continuous practice.
Every season, we release new featured song packs with meticulously designed music and charts for an exhilarating rhythmic experience.

We welcome your feedback to help us improve the product experience.If you encounter any problems while playing, please contact us at：drumlegend2023@gmail.com

name: Drum Legend

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows10+ (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • VR Support: OpenVR supported with Meta Quest, Oculus Rift/S, Valve Index, HTC Vive/Pro/Focus 3/Cosmos, Pico Neo3/4
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows10+ (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-10400 equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 2060 equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • VR Support: OpenVR supported with Meta Quest, Oculus Rift/S, Valve Index, HTC Vive/Pro/Focus 3/Cosmos, Pico Neo3/4

publishers: 上海幻音智娱科技有限公司
